```{r load-data}
library(tidyverse)

# Load data (relative path)
grad <- read_csv("Data/GradSchool_Admissions.csv")

# Clean data
grad <- grad %>%
  mutate(
    admit = factor(admit, levels = c(0,1),
                   labels = c("Rejected","Admitted")),
    rank = factor(rank)
  )

# Quick summaries
summary(grad)
head(grad)

# Admission counts and proportions
table(grad$admit)
prop.table(table(grad$admit))

# Logistic regression models
m1 <- glm(admit ~ gre, data = grad, family = binomial)
m2 <- glm(admit ~ gpa, data = grad, family = binomial)
m3 <- glm(admit ~ rank, data = grad, family = binomial)
m4 <- glm(admit ~ gre + gpa + rank, data = grad, family = binomial)

# Compare models with AIC
AIC(m1, m2, m3, m4)

# Summary and odds ratios for final model
summary(m4)
exp(coef(m4))
